data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 41 believers in Madinat ash Shamal, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Madinat ash Shamal, Qatar
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Madinat ash Shamal, Qatar to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 121 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Madinat ash Shamal, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Spirit, defend the church in the state of Madinat ash Shamal against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Madinat ash Shamal, Qatar.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.prayer: Jesus, 5,000 people live in the state of Madinat ash Shamal. Please, give them 1 new simple churches this year.
Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Madinat ash Shamal, Qatar.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.section_summary:
the state of Madinat ash Shamal, Qatar has a population of 5,000.

We estimate Madinat ash Shamal has 41 people who might know Jesus, 268 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 4,690 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 121 neighbors who need Jesus.
